data.eml:eml: Neotype designation for Rhinogobius carpenteri Seale 1910, and its placement in Tukugobius Herre 1927 (Teleostei: Gobiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Endruweit, Marco (2017): Neotype designation for Rhinogobius carpenteri Seale 1910, and its placement in Tukugobius Herre 1927 (Teleostei: Gobiidae). Zootaxa 4277 (4): 549-560, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4277.4.5
